description: Smallest extractor (138 lines, 1 function). Port to pure function to validate architecture.
design:
## Why sheets.py First

- 138 lines, single function `read_sheets_as_csv()`
- Clear input → output
- If this works, docs.py/slides.py/gmail.py follow same pattern

## Porting Steps

1. Copy extraction logic from v1 tools/sheets.py
2. Remove `get_sheets_service()` call
3. Change signature: `extract_sheets_csv(sheets_response: dict) -> str`
4. Write unit test with fixture
5. Write integration test with real sheet

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] extractors/sheets.py exists
- [ ] Pure function signature
- [ ] Unit test passes
- [ ] Integration test passes
